shot_description: A slow, continuous shot moving alongside a first responder navigating debris-filled streets, camera mounted on a stabilized rig
explanation: This conveys the scale of the destruction while emphasizing the responder's determination and struggle against the chaotic environment.

shot_description: Starting at street level, focusing on a small group of survivors huddled together, the camera slowly rises vertically to reveal the full extent of the earthquake's damage around them
explanation: This shot juxtaposes the vulnerability of the survivors with the immensity of the disaster, highlighting their isolation and the overwhelming odds they face.
